newsitem.title: SPAIN: Clintons to visit Spanish royals on Majorca. [CORRECTED 18:55 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Clintons to visit Spanish royals on Majorca. [CORRECTED 18:55 GMT]

text.p: U.S. President Bill Clinton and his wife Hillary will visit Spain's king and queen on the Mediterranean island of Majorca from July (corrects from June) 5-7 ahead of a NATO summit in Madrid, the royal palace said on Tuesday.
Clinton is planning to attend the July 8-9 summit with the 15 other heads of NATO states to approve an expansion of the alliance that will incorporate new members from eastern Europe.
Majorca, a popular tourist resort, is the largest of the Balearic islands located in the Mediterranean off Spain's eastern coast.

King Juan Carlos of Spain has a palace on Majorca where the royal family spends summer holidays and often hosts visiting royalty and heads of state. The Clintons' visit to Majorca will be private, the palace said.
